name: Trainhem
description: Trainhem is a 2D top-down real-time puzzle game for mobile. You must rotate hex-shaped pieces of train tracks to direct your trains through the level to their destinations. However, you need to be quick because if you’re not fast enough, your trains may go off the rails and crash, or even crash into each other. Faster trains, longer trains, and multiple trains will appear as the levels progress, so you’ll need to stay on your toes.
